doc:
John Bunny https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Bunny 0 John Bunny (September 21, 1863 – April 26, 1915) was an American actor. Bunny began his career as a stage actor, but transitioned to a film career after joining Vitagraph Studios around 1910. At Vitagraph, Bunny made over 150 short films – many of them domestic comedies with the comedian Flora Finch – and became one of the most well-known actors of his era. John_Bunny ( September_21_,_1863 – April_26_,_1915 ) was an_American_actor . Bunny began his_career as a_stage_actor , but transitioned to a_film_career after joining Vitagraph_Studios around 1910 . At Vitagraph , Bunny made over_150_short_films – many of them domestic_comedies with the_comedian_Flora_Finch – and became one of the_most_well-known_actors of his_era .
